page.title: 08WILLIAM STANLEY'S DAY.
page.content: I WAKE UP ABOUT 7.00 A.M.AND GET UP AT 8.10 A.M.AFTER BREAKFAST MUM TAKES MY SISTER AND ME TO SCHOOL IN THE CAR. ON THE WAY WE PICK UP TWO MORE CHILDREN. SCHOOL OPENS AT 9.00 A.M. AND IN THE MORNING WE USUALLY DO MATHS AND ENGLISH.AT 10.30 A.M. WE GO OUT TO PLAY ON THE YARD FOR 10 MINUTES.AT NOON I GO TO RICHARD BENFIELD'S HOUSE TO EAT MY SANDWICHES .AFTER LUNCH WE GO BACK TO SCHOOL AND PLAY UNTIL THE WHISTLE GOES AT 1.15 P.M.IN THE AFTERNOON WE DO LESSONS LIKE SWIMMING IN OUR OWN POOL,ART,CLAY AND GAMES.AT THE END OF THE AFTERNOON MR.BELL OFTEN READS A STORY TO US.THEN WE GO HOME.AT HOME I PUT SOME WATER IN A TUB FOR THE CATTLE TO DRINK.AFTER THAT I PRACTISE THE PIANO.AT 7.30 P.M. I GO TO PIANO LESSONS UNTIL 8.00 P.M.I GO TO BED AT ABOUT 9.00 P.M.
